citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
- In the second trailer, at least 6 cages had an excessive accumulation of feathers, waste and debris. These cages were
empty, but adjacent to occupied cages and could therefore serve as a potential source of contamination to the
neighboring birds. Excreta and food waste must be removed from primary enclosures and from under and around primary
enclosures as often as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste. The licensee must clean
the affected cages and must prevent future accumulations of waste and debris.
Correct by: 23 August 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.158(a)(1) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
- In the second trailer, at least 6 cages had an excessive accumulation of feathers, waste and debris. These cages were 
empty, but adjacent to occupied cages and could therefore serve as a potential source of contamination to the 
neighboring birds. Excreta and food waste must be removed from primary enclosures and from under and around primary 
enclosures as often as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste. The licensee must clean 
the affected cages and must prevent future accumulations of waste and debris. 
Correct by: 23 August 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
